meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling an orgy.
meanings.sent1: The orgiac party had loud music and wild dancing.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted an orgiac scene with people celebrating wildly.
meanings.sent3: The orgiac feast was so extravagant that everyone ate until they were full.
meanings.sent4: The orgiac atmosphere of the carnival made everyone lose their inhibitions.
meanings.sent5: The orgiac celebration was a sight to behold, with people laughing and dancing joyfully.

meanings.definition: Characterized by unrestrained indulgence in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: Her orgiac shopping spree left her with bags full of clothes.
meanings.sent2: The orgiac display of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The orgiac enthusiasm for the new product led to a record number of sales.
meanings.sent4: His orgiac love for chocolate knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The orgiac passion for music was evident in the way she danced with abandon.
